message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm willing to pay $120 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to go. I think it's a fair price considering I'm not willing to go above $150.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't sell it for less than $125.  It's a steal at that price!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $122.50. That's the best I can do.
